ingredients.ingredient: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Ensure beans are completely dry before tossing with oil to promote browning
Spread beans in single layer and roast at high heat to achieve caramelization
Toss beans halfway through cooking for even browning on all sides
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help create caramelized roasted green beans by ensuring proper drying and using high heat for browning.
